languages.text: "И потому в день, когда мой темный кузен атаковал Даргонус, я попыталась его найти. В суматохе ускользнула от чужого внимания, блуждала средь улиц города, словно тень, преследующая хозяина. Напрасно. Я вернулась во дворец в смятении. Выжидала, пока свежие раны утихнут, а бдительность окружающих мон-кай растает, словно туман по утру. Но я все еще сомневалась — быть может, мне стоило поговорить с тобой открыто?"

traits.locale_text: "И потому в день, когда мой темный кузен атаковал Даргонус, я попыталась его найти. В суматохе ускользнула от чужого внимания, блуждала средь улиц города, словно тень, преследующая хозяина. Напрасно. Я вернулась во дворец в смятении. Выжидала, пока свежие раны утихнут, а бдительность окружающих мон-кай растает, словно туман по утру. Желала поговорить с тобой. Выяснить правду".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Which is why I tried to find my dark cousin on the day he attacked Dargonus. I used the commotion to slip away unnoticed and wandered the streets like a shadow in search of its owner. My efforts were futile. I returned to the palace in confusion. I waited for my fresh wounds to stop aching and for the watchfulness of the surrounding mon-keigh to fade like the mist on an autumn morning. But still I had my doubts — perhaps, I thought, I should discuss it openly with you?"
languages.original_text: "И потому в день, когда мой темный кузен атаковал Даргонус, я попыталась его найти. В суматохе ускользнула от чужого внимания, блуждала средь улиц города, словно тень, преследующая хозяина. Напрасно. Я вернулась во дворец в смятении. Выжидала, пока свежие раны утихнут, а бдительность окружающих мон-кай растает, словно туман по утру. Но я все еще сомневалась — быть может, мне стоило поговорить с тобой открыто?"

traits.locale_text: "Which is why I tried to find him on the day my dark cousin attacked Dargonus. I used the commotion to escape the unwanted attention and wandered the streets like a shadow clinging to its owner. My efforts were futile. I returned to the palace in confusion. Waited for the fresh wounds to stop aching and the watchfulness of the surrounding mon-keigh fade like the mist on an autumn morning. I wanted to talk to you. To learn the truth."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

I used the commotion to escape the unwanted attention and wandered the streets like a shadow clinging to its owner. My efforts were futile. I returned to the palace in confusion. Waited for the fresh wounds to stop aching and the watchfulness of the surrounding mon-keigh fade like the mist on an autumn morning. I wanted to talk to you. To learn the truth."

I waited for my fresh wounds to stop aching and for the watchfulness of the surrounding mon-keigh to fade like the mist on an autumn morning. But still I had my doubts — perhaps, I thought, I should discuss it openly with you?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “于是，当我阴暗的表亲袭击达戈努斯时，我打算去找他。骚乱爆发的时候，我悄悄溜了出去，在大街小巷中游荡，仿佛游荡的影子渴望找到肉体，但我的寻找一无所获。我满心迷惑地回到了宫殿，静静地等待着新的伤口不再疼痛，等待周围的猴子心中的警惕像秋天早晨的薄雾一样慢慢消退。但那个时候，我心中仍有许多疑惑。或许我是在想，我是否应该和你开诚布公地谈谈这件事请？”
languages.original_text: "Which is why I tried to find my dark cousin on the day he attacked Dargonus. I used the commotion to slip away unnoticed and wandered the streets like a shadow in search of its owner. My efforts were futile. I returned to the palace in confusion. I waited for my fresh wounds to stop aching and for the watchfulness of the surrounding mon-keigh to fade like the mist on an autumn morning. But still I had my doubts — perhaps, I thought, I should discuss it openly with you?"

traits.locale_text: “于是，当我阴暗的表亲袭击达戈努斯时，我打算去找他。骚乱爆发的时候，我悄悄溜了出去，在大街小巷中游荡，仿佛游荡的影子渴望找到肉体，但我的寻找一无所获。我满心迷惑地回到了宫殿，静静地等待着新的伤口不再疼痛，等待周围的猴子心中的警惕像秋天早晨的薄雾一样慢慢消退。那时，我本想和你谈谈，想要了解真相。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Which is why I tried to find my dark cousin on the day he attacked Dargonus. I used the commotion to slip away unnoticed and wandered the streets like a shadow in search of its owner. My efforts were futile. I returned to the palace in confusion. I waited for my fresh wounds to stop aching and for the watchfulness of the surrounding mon-keigh to fade like the mist on an autumn morning. But still I had my doubts — perhaps, I thought, I should discuss it openly with you?"

languages.text: «Por eso intenté encontrar a mi primo oscuro el día en que atacó Dargonus. Aproveché la conmoción para escapar sin ser vista y vagué por las calles como una sombra en busca de su dueño. Mis esfuerzos fueron fútiles. Volví al palacio confusa. Esperé a que mis heridas recién abiertas dejaran de doler y a que la vigilancia de los mon-keigh que me rodeaban se dispersara como la niebla en una mañana de otoño. Pero tenía mis dudas. Me plantee si podría hablar de ello abiertamente contigo».
languages.original_text: "Which is why I tried to find my dark cousin on the day he attacked Dargonus. I used the commotion to slip away unnoticed and wandered the streets like a shadow in search of its owner. My efforts were futile. I returned to the palace in confusion. I waited for my fresh wounds to stop aching and for the watchfulness of the surrounding mon-keigh to fade like the mist on an autumn morning. But still I had my doubts — perhaps, I thought, I should discuss it openly with you?"

traits.locale_text: «Por eso intenté encontrar a mi primo oscuro el día en que atacó Dargonus. Aproveché la conmoción para escapar sin ser vista y vagué por las calles como una sombra en busca de su dueño. Mis esfuerzos fueron fútiles. Volví al palacio confusa. Esperé a que mis heridas recién abiertas dejaran de doler y a que la vigilancia de los mon-keigh que me rodeaban se dispersara como la niebla en una mañana de otoño. Quería hablar contigo. Descubrir la verdad».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「それゆえに、あいつがダルゴナスを襲撃したあの日、我は闇のいとこを探し出そうとした。騒ぎに乗じてバレずにすり抜けて、影のように通りを彷徨って持ち主を探した。その労力は無駄に終わって、混乱のまま宮殿へ戻ったよ。傷の痛みが収まり、周囲にいるモン＝ケイの警戒が秋の朝の霧のように消えていくのを待った。だが今でもハッキリしない…まさかと思ったのだが、我はお前に心のまま話をするべきだっただろうか？」
languages.original_text: "Which is why I tried to find my dark cousin on the day he attacked Dargonus. I used the commotion to slip away unnoticed and wandered the streets like a shadow in search of its owner. My efforts were futile. I returned to the palace in confusion. I waited for my fresh wounds to stop aching and for the watchfulness of the surrounding mon-keigh to fade like the mist on an autumn morning. But still I had my doubts — perhaps, I thought, I should discuss it openly with you?"

traits.locale_text: 「それゆえに、あいつがダルゴナスを襲撃したあの日、我は闇のいとこを探し出そうとした。騒ぎに乗じてバレずにすり抜けて、影のように通りを彷徨って持ち主を探した。その労力は無駄に終わって、混乱のまま宮殿へ戻ったよ。傷の痛みが収まり、周囲にいるモン＝ケイの警戒が秋の朝の霧のように消えていくのを待った。だが今でもハッキリしない…まさかと思ったのだが、我はお前に心のまま話をするべきだっただろうか？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Darum wollte ich an dem Tag, an dem er Dargonus angegriffen hat, meinen dunklen Vetter finden. Ich habe den Aufruhr genutzt, um unbemerkt zu verschwinden, und bin wie ein Schatten auf der Suche nach seinem Eigentümer durch die Straßen geirrt. Vergebens. Verwirrt bin ich in den Palast zurückgekehrt. Ich habe gewartet, bis meine frischen Wunden nicht mehr schmerzten und die Wachsamkeit der Chem-Pan-Sey in der Umgebung sich auflöste wie der Nebel an einem Herbstmorgen. Dennoch blieben meine Zweifel – die ich, so dachte ich, vielleicht offen mit Euch besprechen sollte?"
languages.original_text: "Which is why I tried to find my dark cousin on the day he attacked Dargonus. I used the commotion to slip away unnoticed and wandered the streets like a shadow in search of its owner. My efforts were futile. I returned to the palace in confusion. I waited for my fresh wounds to stop aching and for the watchfulness of the surrounding mon-keigh to fade like the mist on an autumn morning. But still I had my doubts — perhaps, I thought, I should discuss it openly with you?"

traits.locale_text: "Darum wollte ich an dem Tag, an dem er Dargonus angegriffen hat, meinen dunklen Vetter finden. Ich habe den Aufruhr genutzt, um unbemerkt zu verschwinden, und bin wie ein Schatten auf der Suche nach seinem Eigentümer durch die Straßen geirrt. Vergebens. Verwirrt bin ich in den Palast zurückgekehrt. Ich habe gewartet, bis meine frischen Wunden nicht mehr schmerzen und die Wachsamkeit der Chem-Pan-Sey in der Umgebung sich auflöst wie der Nebel an einem Herbstmorgen. Ich wollte mit Euch sprechen. Um die Wahrheit zu erfahren."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « C'est pour cette raison que j'ai essayé de trouver mon sombre cousin le jour où il a attaqué Dargonus. J'ai profité de l'agitation pour m'éclipser et j'ai parcouru les rues comme une ombre à la recherche de son maître. Mais ça n'a servi à rien. Confuse, je suis retournée au palais. J'ai attendu que la douleur de mes blessures s'estompe et que la vigilance des mon-keigh autour de moi s'évapore comme la brume d'un matin d'automne. Et comme mes doutes persistaient, j'ai songé à venir vous en parler directement. »
languages.original_text: "Which is why I tried to find my dark cousin on the day he attacked Dargonus. I used the commotion to slip away unnoticed and wandered the streets like a shadow in search of its owner. My efforts were futile. I returned to the palace in confusion. I waited for my fresh wounds to stop aching and for the watchfulness of the surrounding mon-keigh to fade like the mist on an autumn morning. But still I had my doubts — perhaps, I thought, I should discuss it openly with you?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est pour cette raison que j'ai essayé de trouver mon cousin noir le jour où il a attaqué Dargonus. J'ai profité de l'agitation pour m'éclipser et j'ai parcouru les rues comme une ombre à la recherche de son maître. Mais ça n'a servi à rien. Confuse, je suis retournée au palais. J'ai attendu que la douleur de mes blessures s'estompe et que la vigilance des mon-keigh autour de moi s'évapore comme la brume d'un matin d'automne. Je voulais vous parler, pour découvrir la vérité. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Bu nedenle Dargonus'a saldırdığı gün, kara soydaşımı bulmayı denedim. Tüm o kargaşadan faydalanıp fark edilmeden ilerledim. Sokaklarda âdeta efendisini arayan bir gölge gibi gezinip durdum. Ancak çabalarım beyhudeydi. Şaşkınlık içinde saraya döndüm. Etimde açılan yaraların ağrısı kesilsin; etrafımdaki mon-keighlerin ihtiyatı, bir sonbahar sabahını bezeyen sis misali sönüp gitsin diye bekledim. Yine de kuşkularımdan kurtulamadım. Belki de... Bu hususta seninle açıkça konuşmam gerektiğini düşündüm."
languages.original_text: "Which is why I tried to find my dark cousin on the day he attacked Dargonus. I used the commotion to slip away unnoticed and wandered the streets like a shadow in search of its owner. My efforts were futile. I returned to the palace in confusion. I waited for my fresh wounds to stop aching and for the watchfulness of the surrounding mon-keigh to fade like the mist on an autumn morning. But still I had my doubts — perhaps, I thought, I should discuss it openly with you?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu nedenle Dargonus'a saldırdığı gün karanlık kuzenimi bulmayı denedim. Tüm o kargaşadan faydalanıp fark edilmeden ilerledim. Sokaklarda âdeta efendisini arayan bir gölge gibi gezinip durdum. Ancak çabalarım beyhudeydi. Şaşkınlık içinde saraya döndüm. Etimde açılan yaraların ağrısı kesilsin, etrafımdaki mon-keighlerin ihtiyatı bir sonbahar sabahını bezeyen sis misali sönüp gitsin diye bekledim. Yine de kuşkularımdan kurtulamadım. Belki de... Bu hususta seninle açıkça konuşmam gerektiğini düşündüm."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
